documents.document:
Can't Wait 'Till Later!

I think later on I'm going to go to Fat City,and play some DDR, or ITG. (Most preferably ITG, which is In The Groove) I don't feel like waiting until four. I want to go now! Grr. Why do they have to open at 11:00? V.V

To Die For - The Birthday Massacre

Tighten your tie boy
You’re something to die for
But don’t hold your breath now
You’re just killing time
Tonight you can dream boy
Imagine a whisper
If you can keep secrets
Then I’ll tell you mine.

Remember a promise you couldn’t hold on to
Though it brings me to tears now i need you to know
Look in my eyes boy
Nothing like yours now
It seems that a lifetime
Is passing us by.

So open your eyes...

This is forever but it won’t last long
This is a memory that fades away in neverending
In the death of all that’s long been said and done before,
We’ll wish that we were something more.

Stop wasting time boy
You’re late all your life boy
They won’t have the patience
For someone like you
Your memory’s fading
I’ll love you forever
I’ll try to remember
I’ll try to hold on

You’re standing alone boy
Waiting for dreams boy
Waiting for something
To make them come true
Don’t ever leave boy
I’d miss you too much boy
I’ll never forget you
As long as I’m here

Rave, and Fat City $12 Tuesday Night

Yeah, so I've got so much shit to do this week. Well, on Tuesday, I have to go to Fat City to, of course, play ITG and DDR. I'm beginning to be able to do the Medium difficulty songs, and I've only been playing for a month, or a little over two. Then, Thursday, I've got an amazing Rave to go to. I'm not sure if I should buy Kandy in advance. Hmm. >> Anyways, I'm pretty excited about this week. ^^

Let's Sleep 'Till The Sun Burns Out

Gasp. So, my music video finished downloading! It's my favorite music video, The Used's - I Caught Fire (In Your Eyes). I forgot why I love that video so much. ^^

Kairi's Letter

Thinking of you where ever you are-

We pray for our sorrows to end
And hope that our hearts will blend
Now I will step forward to realize this wish-

And who knows
Starting a new journey may not be so hard
Or maybe it's already begun-

There are many worlds
But they share the same sky
One sky...
One destiny-

This was a letter from Kairi to Sora off of Kingdom Hearts II.

Yet Again...

I am, as the title intends, alone for another depressing night. Why is it that I have the best days, but the saddest nights? I sit here, moping and even sometimes crying from the point of utter loneliness...What did I do to deserve such a lonesome fate? But I have to realize, even through years of being alone, whether in school, or at home, that I'm going to alone throughout my entire life...And there's nothing I can do to change that. A person really doesn't know how to think, feel, and care when they've been alone for as long as I have...Maybe I'm just being over emotional. Who knows. V_V

Why is it that...

Why is it that whenever I engage into conversation with somebody, they either don't message me the next day, or stop talking to me in the middle of chatting? Is it my appearance? Is it my morbidity? Do I talk too much? What is it about me that repels people?!

My Night...

Is currently comprised of a stomach ache and an argument. Exciting. My friend started saying the DJ Unk is Techno just because it has the word DJ. No. That's not true. DJ Unk is Rap. And amazing. <3 I don't get why people constantly try to fight me when I know I'm right. And to those who try to say, "Techno and Rap are almost the same thing" are almost correct. Techno is made up of different beats and loops, while Rap has it's own. I have nothing against Rap, it's just there really is not very many similarities. Another thing we were arguing about was that Happy Hardcore is an artist, not a genre. No, again. Happy Hardcore is somewhat of a genre, since it really wasn't even allowed to exist. A lot of different music companies wouldn't accept it for it's music, so it entirely became it's own movement. And it's made up of MANY artists. But anyways, I'm done with my ranting. ^-^

Amazing Fucking Rave!

So, I haven't been on here for a while, since I was at a friend's house after GLO at Cervantes, which was in Downtown Denver. It was perfection. Haven't been to one in a while, so it was fucking sweet to finally go back to my kind of scene.

Does anybody know the time?

IT'S PEANUT BUTTER JELLY TIME!
IT'S PEANUT BUTTER JELLY TIME!
IT'S PEANUT BUTTER JELLY TIME!
IT'S PEANUT BUTTER JELLY TIME!
Where he at?
Where he at?
Where he at?
Where he at?
There he go!
There he go!
There he go!
There he go!
Peanut butter jelly!
Peanut butter jelly!
Peanut butter jelly!
Peanut butter jelly!
Do the peanut butter jelly peanut butter jelly Peanut butter jelly with a baseball bat!
Do the peanut butter jelly peanut butter jelly Peanut butter jelly with a baseball bat!

Rant because I'm bored.

Ugh...I forgot why I am misanthope...And don't fear the sarcasm, by the way. What the Hell is wrong with people nowadays? Is this the Whiney Era? STOP whining. As I read these fucking blogs, I'm either developing major stupidity, or I end up being very pissed off by all the bitching. I have nothing against "Emo Kids", but merely the ignorant motherfuckers who don't care about anything but getting some attention, or just craving for somebody to talk to. Talk to somebody well worth your time, not some other idiot. Oh, and if you feel like doing nothing but posting stupid shit on one of my blogs, GO KILL YOURSELF. Please. You are not on this site to piss people off, or to torment somebody because they aren't good enough for your standards. Get over it if you don't like somebody because they don't like the same music, or if they dress different from how you dress. By the way, I'm really getting tired of all the people who whine because they broke up or were broken up with their boyfriend/girlfriend. Sad music doesn't help much either. If you are sad or having a bad day, pathetic whiney music does NOT help. Listen to something that will cheer you up. As quoted by Foamy, "I also can't stand people who sit at home and listen to every rose has it's thorn like it's the world's most depressing song. One, the song sucks. Two, you're fucking pathetic for listening to it. Take the CD out, crack it in half, and then slit your wrist with the broken pieces. It's over. They're done. You're done. Kill yourself." Thank you to all who have either read this or didn't put some fucking comment that was a waste of your time. You are worthless if you decide to put something pointless. Nobody thinks you are funny just because you can call me a "fukin pusy" or use a few adult words. Anyway, thanks for listening.

Sorrow, neverending.

I write this in sheer pain, none other describable...This is not a cry for help, but a cry to release the pain I've witnessed take place in my own skin long enough...Whether or not I'm alone, it stills burns into me, rips depression into my happiness, leaving me with constant sadness...But then again, I guess that's all I know...Especially with no friends, no family, nobody...Especially what I desire, or at least what my soul needs; Love. I'm tired of spending countless nights, either crying myself to sleep, or days in which I rot alone. School isn't an option anymore, especially with practically everyone at my last school strongly disliking me for difference. I'm far too shy to actually walk out into nameless areas and just make friends...So, what really is there to do? I haven't left my house in almost five days. I need a life, but for someone like me, there's no point to trying...My trust level is out the window, and I highly doubt that anyone's coming to my rescue...Staring down this screen is constant, my only way of living. So, in closing, feel free to call me "Emo", or whatever words you feel need to be said...But as I had said already, this is to simply get weight off of my shoulders.

A Structure of Diabolical Messages

A creature enveloped and unexposed to the naked eye.
A secrecy dedicated entirely to malevolency and malice.
The graveolent cadavers putrefact beneath the basking tongue of flames.
A depraved youth strides to the fatid conservatory to which he was devoured into the womb.
A flourishing blossom of the dusk emits it's existence into factual enticement.
The seducement of a beloved catalyst is calamitous and tragic amidst the defiled and tainted.

My Emotions Mixed With My Standards...

I knew it wasn't a good idea to listen to Dancing In The Dark...I feel like I'm letting everybody I know down...Such people as my family, my very few friends (Those that go to my school), and the girl who I care for...My family for the reason that I'm not as worthy as they want me to be...My friends, mainly because I don't feel like I'm being a very trustworthy and caring friend to them...And, the girl who I like, because I fear losing her...We may not be going out, but....I feel strong by her...I feel like I'm living the life the majority of people tell me that I should live...But anyways, I just thought I should put how I'm currently feeling right now...So I can somewhat get it off my shoulders.
